home.title: All the online tools you need

categoryDesc.pdf: Merge, split, compress and convert PDFs

categoryDesc.developer: JSON, Base64, Regex, QR Code and more

privacy.title: Privacy guaranteed
privacy.desc: Your files are processed directly in your browser. No uploads to external servers.

fast.title: Fast and free
fast.desc: All tools are free and work instantly with no waiting.

free.title: No registration
free.desc: No account required. Use any tool immediately, with no limits.
